p.k: Art Malaysia (2009). Hrají: Zahiril Adzim, Amerul Affendi, Hariry Jalil. Režie: Chris Chan Fui Chong.
p.d: In a small Malaysian village, Betik returns from Kuala Lumpur. He intends to build up a future back home with his mother and starts helping out in the family’s karaoke bar – a karaoke where the neighbourhood gathers and sings. But nobody is as naďve as he seems. In the innocence of a small village in the estate, subtle manipulations and deceptions seep through.
